backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping UI redesign, readability fixes, asset updates, and theme cleanup to affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and styling updates of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH theme variables defining the dark‑only color system and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing section navigation and rendering all site sections.
frontend/src/components/icons/DiscordIco: Discord SVG icon component with configurable className.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact section showing WhatsApp and Discord buttons styled with glassmorphism and neon effects.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Dashbo: Dashboard with tab navigation and content panels including payment, support, and profile sections.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero section with premium banner, layered gradients, and large neon‑styled headings.
frontend/src/components/marketing/PanelC: Displays a panel card showing its name, price range, and a buy button that triggers a callback.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Panels: Provides search, filter, listing of panels, and opens a payment panel when a panel is selected.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Paymen: Handles duration selection, UPI copying, and generates WhatsApp payment proof links for a selected panel.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Pricin: Renders a pricing table for all panels with durations in desktop and mobile-friendly views.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Vertical navigation bar allowing switching between site sections with icons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteFo: Displays footer with copyright text and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/marketing/SiteHe: Shows the site header with logo and branding text.
frontend/src/components/marketing/ThemeT: Empty placeholder component for theme switching.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Exports the static UPI ID used for payments.
frontend/src/config/social.ts: Exports WhatsApp number and Discord invite URL.
frontend/src/data/panels.ts: Defines panel and pricing interfaces and provides a list of panel pricing data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity React context and provider that manages AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based dark cyberpunk theme variables and utility classes including neon glow and glassmorphism effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/paymentProof.ts: Builds a WhatsApp link for sending payment proof with optional panel, duration, and amount fields.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp deep‑link message for initiating a panel purchase.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling dark mode and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the current UI redesign plan, payment flow changes, issues, and architectural notes.
